modules.description: Retrieves the command line arguments passed to the unikernel, excluding the binary name. Works with string data to provide access to runtime configuration parameters. Useful for parsing startup options or initializing components based on command-line input.
Retrieves command-line arguments as a string array. Works with standard string arrays. Useful for accessing program arguments in a standalone MirageOS unikernel.

Splits a Unix-style command-line string into a list of arguments, handling whitespace separation and backslash-based quoting. Processes strings to correctly parse escaped characters and nested quotes. Useful for interpreting command-line inputs in scripts or system tools.
